languages.text: "Грядет шторм, кракены поднимаются из глубин за кровавой поживой, а ты хочешь оставить свой дреккар без лучшего гребца?"
"The storm is coming, the krakens are rising from the depths for a bloody feast, and you want to leave your drekkar without its best oarsman?"
languages.original_text: "Грядет шторм, кракены поднимаются из глубин за кровавой поживой, а ты хочешь оставить свой дреккар без лучшего гребца?"

traits.locale_text: "The storm is coming, the krakens are rising from the depths for a bloody feast, and you want to leave your drekkar without its best oarsman?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The storm is coming, the krakens are rising from the depths for a bloody feast, and you want to leave your drekkar without its best oarsman?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The storm is coming, the krakens are rising from the depths for a bloody feast, and you want to leave your drekkar without its best oarsman?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The storm is coming, the krakens are rising from the depths for a bloody feast, and you want to leave your drekkar without its best oarsman?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “风暴即将来临。海怪正从深海而来，准备进行一场血腥的盛宴，而你却打算将你最好的桨手赶下你的撞角长船？”
languages.original_text: "The storm is coming, the krakens are rising from the depths for a bloody feast, and you want to leave your drekkar without its best oarsman?"

traits.locale_text: “风暴即将来临。海怪正从深海而来，准备进行一场血腥的盛宴，而你却打算将你最好的桨手赶下你的撞角长船？”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Se acerca la tormenta, los krakens salen de las profundidades para darse un festín sanguinario, ¿y quiere dejar a su drekkar sin el mejor remero?».
languages.original_text: "The storm is coming, the krakens are rising from the depths for a bloody feast, and you want to leave your drekkar without its best oarsman?"

traits.locale_text: «Se acerca la tormenta, los krakens salen de las profundidades para darse un festín sanguinario, ¿y quiere dejar a su drekkar sin el mejor remero?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「嵐がやってきて、クラーケンが血の饗宴のために深淵より這い上がる。お前は最高の漕手もなしに、ドレッカールをそのままにしておきたいか？」
languages.original_text: "The storm is coming, the krakens are rising from the depths for a bloody feast, and you want to leave your drekkar without its best oarsman?"

traits.locale_text: 「嵐がやってきて、クラーケンが血の饗宴のために深淵より這い上がる。お前は最高の漕手もなしに、ドレッカールをそのままにしておきたいか？」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Der Sturm kommt, die Kraken erheben sich für ein blutiges Gelage aus den Tiefen, und Ihr wollt Eurem Drekkar den besten Ruderer nehmen?"
languages.original_text: "The storm is coming, the krakens are rising from the depths for a bloody feast, and you want to leave your drekkar without its best oarsman?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Sturm kommt, die Kraken erheben sich für ein blutiges Gelage aus den Tiefen, und Ihr wollt Eurem Drekkar den besten Ruderer nehmen?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « L'orage gronde, les krakens émergent des profondeurs, attirés par le sang, et vous voulez vous passer du meilleur rameur de votre drekkar ? »
languages.original_text: "The storm is coming, the krakens are rising from the depths for a bloody feast, and you want to leave your drekkar without its best oarsman?"

traits.locale_text: « L'orage gronde, les krakens émergent des profondeurs, attirés par le sang, et vous voulez vous passer du meilleur rameur de votre drekkar ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "The storm is coming, the krakens are rising from the depths for a bloody feast, and you want to leave your drekkar without its best oarsman?"

languages.text: "Fırtına yaklaşıyor, krakenler kanlı bir ziyafet masasından kalkıyor ve sen drekkarını en iyi kürekçisi olmadan yola çıkarmak mı istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "The storm is coming, the krakens are rising from the depths for a bloody feast, and you want to leave your drekkar without its best oarsman?"

traits.locale_text: "Fırtına yaklaşıyor, krakenler kanlı bir ziyafet masasından kalkıyor ve sen drekkarını en iyi kürekçisi olmadan yola çıkarmak mı istiyorsun?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
